answers.answer: It could be but I'd definitely go get it checked asap... It could be a minor pregnancy symptom but it also could have something to do with poor blood flow, preeclampsia of even a blood clot! So definitely go in (:
I was told by my doctor if its reddish purplish let her know asap bc that will be a concern to her

question: So I notice my legs are changing colors at the bottom. They are like reddish purple. Is that from swelling?
title: swelling
